languages.text: [Сломать агонатор в руке Маражая] "Пока ты в моей свите, забудь о подобной мерзости".
[Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."
languages.original_text: [Сломать агонатор в руке Маражая] "Пока ты в моей свите, забудь о подобной мерзости".

traits.locale_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

[Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

languages.text: [折断玛拉斋手中的折磨之鞭]“只要你还是我的随行人员，就不准想这些让人恶心的事情。”
languages.original_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

traits.locale_text: [折断玛拉斋手中的折磨之鞭]“只要你还是我的随行人员，就不准想这些让人恶心的事情。”

languages.text: [マラズハイの手にあるアゴナイザーを叩き落とす]「{mf|俺|私}の仲間でいる内は、そんな不気味なもののことは忘れろ」
languages.original_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

traits.locale_text: [マラズハイの手にあるアゴナイザーを叩き落とす]「{mf|俺|私}の仲間でいる内は、そんな不気味なもののことは忘れろ」

languages.text: [Partir en dos el agonizador que sostiene Marazhai] «Mientras formes parte de mi séquito, ya te puedes ir olvidando de tales abominaciones».
languages.original_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

traits.locale_text: [Partir en dos el agonizador que sostiene Marazhai] «Mientras formes parte de mi séquito, ya te puedes ir olvidando de tales abominaciones».

languages.text: [Fracasser le neurocide dans la main de Marazhai] « Tant que vous ferez partie de mon entourage, vous devrez faire une croix sur ce genre d'abominations. »
languages.original_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

traits.locale_text: [Fracasser le neurocide dans la main de Marazhai] « Tant que vous ferez partie de mon entourage, vous devrez faire une croix sur ce genre d'abominations. »

languages.text: [Marazhai den Peiniger entreißen] "Solange Ihr Teil meines Gefolges seid, verzichtet Ihr auf solche Abscheulichkeiten."
languages.original_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

traits.locale_text: [Marazhai den Peiniger entreißen] "Solange Ihr Teil meines Gefolges seid, verzichtet Ihr auf solche Abscheulichkeiten."

languages.text: [Marazhai'ın elindeki kıvrandırana vur] "Maiyetimde olduğun sürece böylesi iğrençlikleri unutabilirsin."
languages.original_text: [Snap the agoniser in Marazhai's hand] "While you are in my retinue, you can forget about such abominations."

traits.locale_text: [Marazhai'ın elindeki kıvrandırana vur] "Maiyetimde olduğun sürece böylesi iğrençlikleri unutabilirsin."
